data.lyric:
[ti:Krippy Kush (Travis Scott Remix)]

[00:01.20]Written by：Carlos Efrén Reyes-Rosado/Benito Martínez Ocasio/Franklin Martinez/Thomas Kevin Richard/Tarik Johnston P.K.A. Rvssian
[00:02.19]Nicki Minaj/Rvssian：
[00:02.66]Hola
[00:03.08]
[00:04.28]Me llamo Onika
[00:04.82]
[00:06.01]Wrist FRIO
[00:06.61]
[00:07.98]Pelo rosa
[00:08.70]
[00:09.41]Culo gordo
[00:10.40]El Rvssian
[00:10.96]Bad Bunny：
[00:10.96]Lo' maliantes quieren krippy krippy krippy krippy krippy
[00:13.77]To'a las babys quieren kush kush kush kush kush
[00:16.68]Lo' gansters quieren krippy krippy krippy krippy krippy
[00:19.60]To'a las babys quieren kush kush kush kush kush
[00:22.75]Lo' maliantes quieren krippy krippy krippy krippy krippy
[00:25.56]To'a las babys quieren kush kush kush kush kush
[00:28.24]
[00:28.86]Lo' gansters quieren krippy krippy krippy krippy krippy
[00:31.42]To'a las putas quieren kush jajaja yeah yeah yeah
[00:35.25]Nicki Minaj：
[00:35.71]Make some room keep a hundred feet away
[00:38.75]Fifty trucks when I pull up we a fleet away
[00:41.69]You ain't on my throne ain't even a seat away
[00:44.52]But thanks to Nicki all these new can see the way
[00:47.48]I got the krippy I ain't talking 'bout the gangs though
[00:50.45]Had all these rocking pink hair and bangs though
[00:53.42]Now I got 'em rocking inches now
[00:55.94]But I'll leave these hanging like lynches now
[00:58.71]Word play got 'em stepping up they pens-es now
[01:01.63]Still stick me for my flow like syringes now
[01:04.67]Still kicking closed doors off the hinges now
[01:07.54]Shotgun and them '88 Benzes now
[01:10.58]With my plug I call him Poncho but I think he wants that
[01:13.75]Put this in his boca make my take his coca
[01:16.34]Now I'm balling like I'm Sosa in a Lamborghini rosa
[01:19.38]Yelling ¡Viva Puerto Rico all my hermosa
[01:22.15]Bad Bunny：
[01:22.53]
[01:24.62]Pero ahora estoy pa'l krippy krippy krippy krippy krippy
[01:27.42]También tenemos kush kush kush kush kush
[01:30.33]Lo' gansters quieren krippy krippy krippy krippy krippy
[01:33.27]To'a las putas quieren kush jajaja
[01:36.04]Travis Scott：
[01:36.44]
[01:37.38]Suavemente frio chill-ay Yeah
[01:39.69]Gotta keep it caliente the presidente
[01:41.78]
[01:42.55]Bend it backwards pop a wheelie like we in Phill-ay It's lit
[01:46.13]In the town I got the mill-ays you know the drill-ay Alright
[01:48.87]Yeah butterfly the doors throw a ivy queen in it then I skrt skrt skrt skrt skrt
[01:53.85]You get the picture but I'm still not with the pictures
[01:56.13]Still hate the liquor drank on my liver
[01:58.35]Still got the basement jumping like I'm Tigger Straight up
[02:01.01]Pour 'til it's muddy blow 'til it's muggy Yeah
[02:03.61]But the gang goin' dummy thumbing through hundreds
[02:06.07]With the gang
[02:06.55]Keep it stick like it's gummy rap like a mummy
[02:09.30]Break the bread 'til it's crummy eat 'til I'm chubby Yeah
[02:12.26]Yeah me amor the tings me amor the green Alright
[02:15.32]Yeah blowing up the clouds and hear the angels sing Sing
[02:18.42]Yeah fresh steal off the lot
[02:19.62]Slide on your block and pop the top and then
[02:21.45]We skrt skrt skrt skrt skrt
[02:22.99]

[02:24.20]
[02:26.36]Pero ahora estoy pa'l krippy krippy krippy krippy krippy

[02:44.74]

[02:50.83]

[02:59.59]

[03:08.41]

[03:11.09]

[03:14.35]

[03:17.23]
[03:18.10]Sintéticas de esas que venden por ahí en los puestos legal
[03:20.15]

[03:23.07]
